title: Turn the Constant into log
text: Use the definition of logarithm, we can get $$2=\log_{3}\left(9\right)$$ since $$3^2=9$$.

title: Match Bases
text: With all term containing same log base, the log can be removed, so it becomes $$x^2=9$$. Solve for x and get $$x=-3$$ or $$x=3$$.

title: Check for Constrains
text: Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, b can not be negative. We can omit the negative answer and get $$x=3$$ as the only solution for the equation.
